Uses of Class
org.openurc.uch.UIPMFatalException

  • Packages that use UIPMFatalException 
    Package Description
    org.openurc.uch
    Provides Interfaces which are used to communicate among different modules like UCH, TDM, TA and UIPM.

    • Uses of UIPMFatalException in org.openurc.uch

      Methods in org.openurc.uch that throw UIPMFatalException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void IUIPM.contextsClosed(List<Map<String,IProfile>> contexts)
      Called when one or more contexts were closed or have expired on the UCH.
      void IUIPM.contextsOpened(List<Map<String,IProfile>> contexts)
      Called when one or more contexts have been opened on the UCH.
      void IUIPM.contextsUpdated(List<Map<String,IProfile>> contexts)
      Called when one or more contexts have been updated on the UCH.
      void IUIPM.controllerRequest(String protocol, Object request, Object response, Map<String,IProfile> context)
      The UCH calls this function if it has received a request from a controller to a URI that the UIPM has claimed for itself by a previous call to startUriService().It call desired methods of IUIPMListener and make changes to response object.
      List<Map<String,IProfile>> IUIPM.getUriServiceContexts(String uri)
      Get list of contexts for one of the UIPM's service URI.
      void IUIPM.init(IUIPMListener uipmListener, Map<String,String> uipmProps, Map<String,String> uchProps, List<Map<String,IProfile>> contexts)
      When the UIPM is installed and loaded, the UCH calls this method prior to any other UIPM function and allows the UIPM to initialize itself.
      void IUIPM.sessionAborted(String sessionId, String code)
      The target has terminated a session.
      void IUIPM.sessionForwardRequest(String sessionId, Map<String,String> forwardInfo)
      The target requests the UIPM to open a session with a different socket.
      void IUIPM.targetContextsAdded(String targetId, List<Map<String,IProfile>> contexts)
      Called when one or more contexts got added to an existing target.
      void IUIPM.targetContextsRemoved(String targetId, List<Map<String,IProfile>> contexts)
      Called when one or more contexts got removed to an existing target.
      void IUIPM.targetDiscarded(String targetId)
      This function is called by UCH when a target has been discarded after initialization of the UIPM.
      void IUIPM.targetDiscovered(String targetId, List<Map<String,IProfile>> contexts)
      This function is called by UCH when a new target has been discovered after initialization of the UIPM.
      void IUIPM.updateValues(List<String> sessionIds, List<String> paths, List<String> operations, List<String> values, List<Map<String,String>> props)
      The target's status has changed, affecting one or more sessions.
